name: Crude Oil Futures

about.what_it_is: CL=F tracks front-month WTI crude oil futures pricing.
about.what_it_represents: It represents global energy demand, supply constraints, and geopolitical risk premiums.
about.who_or_what: It is a commodity futures contract, not a company.
about.how_it_works: Futures react to inventory data, production policy, transport bottlenecks, and macro growth expectations.
